Cash and Equivalents: cash and cash equivalents at carrying value
Marketable Securities (Short-term): available for sale securities debt securities

Long-term Investments: equity method investments in preferred stock and common stock
Other Non-Current Assets: property subject to or available for operating lease net
unamortized deferred charges on reinsurance assumed

Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income: accumulated other comprehensive income loss net of tax
Common Stock and APIC: additional paid in capital common stock
Total Equity: stockholders equity including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest

Accounts Payable and Accrued Expenses: accounts payable and accrued liabilities current and noncurrent
other payables to broker dealers and clearing organizations
Other Current Liabilities: liability for claims and claims adjustment expense
payable for purchase of short term investments in u s treasury bills
payable for purchases of u s treasury bills

Other Non-Current Liabilities: liability for unpaid claims and claim adjustment expense retroactive reinsurance contracts

__unmapped__: aircraft repurchase liabilities and deferred revenue leases net
cash cash equivalents and u s treasury bills
liabilities excluding income taxes principally deferred
property plant and equipment and assets held for lease net
redeemable noncontrolling interest equity common carrying amount
